overview: Paradoxical Synchronicity sends a message about life's often Unnoticed Interconnectivity, and Raises Awareness to the everlasting effects of Childhood Trauma; while emphasizing how Societal Pressures, all too often, navigate us away from Our Gifts, Our Talents, and Our Dreams. Though Mentored, Guided, and Inspired by a few exceptionally Wise, and seemingly Old Souls, an Extraordinary Young Man will Tragically throw it all away.
title: Paradoxical Synchronicity
